p: However, additional lines of evidence are beginning to emerge. The first is the report of an international panel of experts who visited China [ 12]. They looked at the cases across China that were reported after February the 1st. At this point, the identification of those infected was significantly improved. Also, hospitals were better prepared for the epidemic. Case-fatality rate of all cases that came under health surveillance and were tested dropped to about 0.7% [ 12].
